titleStmt.title: The Royall line of kings, queenes, and princes, from the vniting of the two royall houses, Yorke and Lancaster

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Woodcut group port. of rulers of England from Henry VII to James I, with Queen Anne, Princes Henry and Charles (later Charles I), and Princess Elizabeth with her husband Frederick of Bohemia.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
